results.title: First documented case of Smith-Lemli-Opitz syndrome in Syria: clinical presentation, diagnosis, and experimental management with simvastatin.
results.text_hl: First documented case of @DISEASE_Smith_Lemli_Opitz_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D019082 @@@Smith-Lemli-Opitz syndrome@@@ in Syria: clinical presentation, diagnosis, and experimental management with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Aladia AH, Hamdan S, Alkheder A. First documented case of Smith-Lemli-Opitz syndrome in Syria: clinical presentation, diagnosis, and experimental management with simvastatin. Oxf Med Case Reports. 2024 Nov;2024(11):omae129. PMID: 39575090

results.title: [Skin manifestation of mixed hyperlipidaemia in the course of decompensated diabetes].
results.text_hl: During the treatment the infusion liquids, @CHEMICAL_Insulin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007328 @@@insulin@@@, metronidasol, amoxiclav, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ were administered.

citations.NLM: Gajer GK, Krawczyk AK, Petrulewicz-Salamon IT. [Skin manifestation of mixed hyperlipidaemia in the course of decompensated diabetes]. Wiad Lek. 2006;59(3-4):265-8. PMID: 16813277
